=== About Me ===

My Name is D.M. Shanto Islam and I am 24 years old.

I am a Student doing Computer Science Engineering Study In Ahsanullah Institute of Technical and Vocational Education And Training.  After years Then Auto mechanics Engineering and Programming .When i was kid i saw people typing codes in black screen.I would have been surprised that how do they do it , how they understand all this codes, programs and logic, then I join high school one of my friend told me about linux i checked it out online seems legit , so i installed Ubuntu Linux 14.04 and it was awesome.Now a days I try to find those people around me basically in my local area having problem about installing Configuring basically on the student platform those who are using linux for the first time also use it for personal use / development. I feel happy to help them. In a word I love Ubuntu.
